author: USA TODAY, Steve Gardner, USA TODAY
title: Manchester City's Kyle Walker apologizes, could face discipline for allegedly partying with sex workers during lockdown
description: Manchester City player apologizes "for the choices I made" after tabloid reveals details of alleged party at apartment in violation of shutdown.
content:
A Manchester City soccer player is facing discipline after a tabloid reported he and a friend violated a national shutdown order by allegedly hosting a party with sex workers. 
The United Kingdom's The Sun says Walker invited two women to his apartment a day… [+1357 chars]
